text:
This happends after the following procedure:

If you try to rename the navigation title of a locked document an error messages is displayed. 
If you try it again with the same document you'll get this error.
After that happend a login to the authoring area is impossible. 

Afterwards the highest version of sitetree.xml.rcml in
[mypub]/content/authoring ist higher then the version of sitetree.xml.
When I removed the higher version entries in sitetree.xml.rcml and
restarted lenya the error disapeared.
creator: rudolf.korhummel@uniklinik-freiburg.de
rudolf.korhummel@uniklinik-freiburg.de
text:
This happend also if the visibility of a locked document is changed.
Fixed bug with revisison 883690.
